description: Excel is the most widely-used spreadsheet application in the world. It comes with every edition of the Microsoft Office suite and is designed for home, academic, and business environments.

The software includes many pre-created XLTX files that allow you to get a head start on creating spreadsheets, such as budget planners, calendars, and invoices. You can also create custom templates from your spreadsheets. To save a spreadsheet as an XLTX file with Microsoft Excel, select File â†’Save As , then choose "Excel Template" from the format dropdown menu.
NOTE: XLTX files are saved in the Open XML file format Microsoft introduced in Microsoft Office 2007. The template type replaced .XLT files, which are stored in a binary format.
